name: Centipede Reborn
description:
Centipede Reborn is a strategic survival game where you must escape from the humans chasing you, move up the rows by interacting with buildings and flee the scene alive.

Game Resources   

Building Blocks : It helps player create buildings on the game scene, can be collected by killing mini bots. 

Health Portions :  Will increase the centipede length whenever consumed.

Controls 

A, D - for Moment and the Player can move left, right just like the classic centipede game

Spacebar - To place buildings 

Game Rules 

  • The Player has to control the centipede and escape the humans by moving up the rows by interacting with buildings.
  • The Player has to collect building blocks by killing mini bots.
  • A Building is spawned whenever the Player gets hit by the mini bot bullets. (Sacrifice a length of the body)
  • Getting Caught by the Mega robot or completing losing the centipede body will end the game.

USP

 

  • Ability to place buildings (gives Player more control over the game)
  • Different experiences for everyone (Multiple strategies to get a high score)
  • Unique collectibles such as building blocks, Portions
